I also had her on a raw food diet for the last three years, but tried an air dried diet (that comes from New Zealand) and she still loves her food, Iâ€™m so glad that I made the switch because I was tired of dealing with the frozen aspect and being overly cautious!

Please do your research before feeding raw especially with immunocompromised individuals (BABY) in your home. Dogs fed raw meat are more likely to shed bacteria that is pathogenic to humans including salmonella and ecoli.
